Data.oldValue: Invalid Business Partner Value Format You should use the format [V, J, G, E][00000000] Example: V20000000 / J400000000

PO.Data: Invalid Business Partner Value Format You should use the format [V, J, G, E, X (External unkow)][00000000] Example: V20000000 / J400000000
